metadata.description: Specifies the name of the data collection rule to create.
Specifies the Azure resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace to use to send data to.
Specifies the Azure resource ID of the Data Collection Endpoint to use.

AADTenantId.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID.

AlternateSignInName.description: The identification that the user provided to sign in. It may be the userPrincipalName but it's also populated when a user signs in using other identifiers.

AppDisplayName.description: The application name displayed in the Azure Portal.

AppId.description: The application identifier in Azure Active Directory.

AppliedEventListeners.description: Detailed information about the listeners, such as Azure Logic Apps and Azure Functions, that were triggered by the corresponding events in the sign-in event.

AuthenticationContextClassReferences.description: Contains a collection of values that represent the conditional access authentication contexts applied to the sign-in.

AuthenticationDetails.description: The result of the authentication attempt and additional details on the authentication method.

AuthenticationMethodsUsed.description: The authentication methods used. Possible values: SMS, Authenticator App, App Verification code, Password, FIDO, PTA, or PHS.

AuthenticationProcessingDetails.description: Additional authentication processing details, such as the agent name in case of PTA/PHS or Server/farm name in case of federated authentication.

AuthenticationProtocol.description: Lists the protocol type or grant type used in the authentication. Possible values are: none, oAuth2, ropc, wsFederation, saml20, deviceCode.

AuthenticationRequirement.description: This holds the highest level of authentication needed through all the sign-in steps for sign-in to succeed.

AuthenticationRequirementPolicies.description: Sources of authentication requirement, such as conditional access, per-user MFA, identity protection, and security defaults.

AutonomousSystemNumber.description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the network used by the actor.

ClientAppUsed.description: The legacy client used for sign-in activity. For example: Browser, Exchange ActiveSync, Modern clients, IMAP, MAPI, SMTP, or POP.

ConditionalAccessPolicies.description: A list of conditional access policies that are triggered by the corresponding sign-in activity.

ConditionalAccessStatus.description: The status of the conditional access policy triggered. Possible values: success, failure, or notApplied.

CorrelationId.description: The identifier that's sent from the client when sign-in is initiated.

CreatedDateTime.description: The date and time the sign-in was initiated. Always in UTC time.

CrossTenantAccessType.description: Describes the type of cross-tenant access used by the actor to access the resource.

DeviceDetail.description: The device information from where the sign-in occurred.

DurationMs.description: Duration of the sign-in process in milliseconds.

FlaggedForReview.description: Indicates if the sign-in was flagged for review.

HomeTenantId.description: The tenant identifier of the user initiating the sign in.

Id.description: The identifier representing the sign-in activity.

Identity.description: The display name of the actor identified in the sign-in.

IpAddress.description: The IP address of the client from where the sign-in occurred.

IpAddressFromResourceProvider.description: The IP address a user used to reach a resource provider.

_IsBillable.description: Specifies whether ingesting the data is billable.

IsInteractive.description: Indicates whether a user sign in is interactive.

IsRisky.description: Indicates if the sign-in is considered risky.

Level.description: Risk level associated with the sign-in.

Location.description: The 2 letter country code from where the sign-in occurred.

LocationDetails.description: Provides detailed location information of the sign-in.

NetworkLocationDetails.description: The network location details including the type of network used.

OperationName.description: The name of the operation performed during the sign-in.

OperationVersion.description: The version of the operation performed.

OriginalRequestId.description: The request identifier of the first request in the authentication sequence.

ProcessingTimeInMilliseconds.description: The processing time for the sign-in in milliseconds.

Resource.description: The resource the user signed in to.

ResourceDisplayName.description: The name of the resource that the user signed in to.

ResourceGroup.description: The resource group associated with the sign-in.

ResourceId.description: The identifier of the resource that the user signed in to.

ResourceIdentity.description: The identity of the resource that the user signed in to.

ResourceProvider.description: The resource provider of the signed-in application.

ResourceServicePrincipalId.description: The identifier of the service principal representing the target resource in the sign-in event.

ResourceTenantId.description: The tenant identifier of the resource referenced in the sign-in.

ResultDescription.description: Provides the error message or the reason for failure for the corresponding sign-in activity.

ResultType.description: Provides the 5-6 digit error code generated during a sign-in event.

RiskDetail.description: The reason behind a specific state of a risky user, sign-in, or a risk event.

RiskEventTypes_V2.description: The list of risk event types associated with the sign-in.

RiskLevel.description: The risk level during the sign-in.

RiskState.description: The risk state of a risky user, sign-in, or a risk event.

ServicePrincipalId.description: The application identifier used for sign-in.

ServicePrincipalName.description: The application name used for sign-in.

SessionLifetimePolicies.description: Any conditional access session management policies that were applied during the sign-in event.

SignInIdentifier.description: The identification that the user provided to sign in.

SignInIdentifierType.description: The type of sign in identifier.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by.

Status.description: The sign-in status, including error code and description.

TimeGenerated.description: The time the sign-in record was generated.

TokenIssuerName.description: The name of the identity provider.

UniqueTokenIdentifier.description: A unique base64 encoded request identifier used to track tokens issued by Azure AD.

UserAgent.description: The user agent information related to sign-in.

UserDisplayName.description: The display name of the user.
